tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ecotourism_impact_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  impact_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE EcotourismActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    activity_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE ecotourism_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    environmental_impact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ecotourism_activities (
  activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  activity_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  activity_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  environmental_impact DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
  tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  tour_guide VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  tour_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  duration_hours INT NOT NULL,
  cost DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  participant_age INT NOT NULL,
  participant_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  activity_id UUID REFERENCES ecotourism_activities(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  impact_score INT,
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EcotourismParticipants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityPractices (
  practice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  recurring_event BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ActivityLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  log_date DATETIME,
  duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE SeasonalTrends (
  season_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  season_name VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT,
  activity_count INT
)
